action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig
Heath Maguire moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox

full_threads.body:
Hi team,


We have had some pricing adjustments to our L&D individual participant minimums.


We need to clarify across all comms that individual participant sessions require a minimum amount of people per session.



Please note the Group Workshops remain unchanged.


Can you please confirm when the landing page, and any other digital marketing comms (if any) are updated as per the below.


Team Development Courses:

ALL Courses - Minimum 4 Participants
i.e. $800 per participant (minimum 4 participants)


Leadership Development Courses:
  1. Good to Great - $3,500 per participant (minimum 6 participants)
  2. Executive Leaders - $3,500 per participant (minimum 6 participants)
  3. Performance Management - $800 per participant (minimum 4 participants)
  4. Performance Appraisal - $800 per participant (minimum 4 participants)

Employee Relations & Safety Courses:
ALL Courses - Minimum 4 Participants
i.e. $800 per participant (minimum 4 participants)


If you need any clarification at all, please let me know.


Thank you so much.

Montana Agostino​​​​
Brand and Marketing Manager
E.
Montana.Agostino@performhr.com.au
W.
performhr.com.au
Click here to view our Legal Disclaimer.
